title: 关于服务器Chest Commands插件制作商店的问题
author: yuzhou1
txt_content:
怎么出售像动物蛋这些有附属ID的物品？
我配置是这样的
buy-18:
  PRICE: 300
  COMMAND: 'give:383:95,1'
  NAME: '&a狼 x1'
  LORE:
    - '$300'
  ID: 383
  DATA-VALUE: 95
  KEEP-OPEN: false
  POSITION-X: 6
  POSITION-Y: 3
读取插件后购买这个物品总是提示The admin has misconfigured the item to give.Invalid item ID:383:95

replies.txt_content:
